body_html:
Gunan, thank you . I decided to work with anaconda3 , do I need to install Cuda 9.2 as an update ? in anaconda3 I did the following commands:
sudo -H apt-get install git
sudo -H apt-get install python3
sudo -H apt-get install python3-matplotlib
sudo -H apt-get install python3-pip
sudo -H pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
and it seems everything was updated fine , then I tried to import tensorflow as tf and got the error again

body:
Gunan, thank you .  I decided to work with anaconda3 , do I need to install Cuda 9.2 as an update ?  in anaconda3 I did the following commands: 
sudo -H apt-get install git
	sudo -H apt-get install python3
	sudo -H apt-get install python3-matplotlib
	sudo -H apt-get install python3-pip
	sudo -H pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
and it seems everything was updated fine , then I tried to import tensorflow as tf and got the error again
